TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: 提供 介面的 Managed 定義。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`IDataObject`介面，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about the `IDataObject` interface, see the MSDN Library. 當原生程式碼的 COM 方法會傳回 HRESULT，通用語言執行平台，則會擲回例外狀況。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public int DAdvise (ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC pFormatetc, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF advf, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink adviseSink, out int connection);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DAdvise([in]valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC& pFormatetc, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF advf, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink adviseSink, [out] int32& connection) cil managed

public: int DAdvise(System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::FORMATETC % pFormatetc, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::ADVF advf, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IAdviseSink ^ adviseSink, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % connection);
abstract member DAdvise : * System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF * System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink * -> int

param.name: pFormatetc
param.span: 以傳址 (By Reference) 方式傳遞的 結構，定義用於後續告知的格式、目標裝置、外觀和媒體。

span.span: A structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, target device, aspect, and medium that will be used for future notifications.

param.name: advf
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定用於控制諮詢連接的一組旗標。

span.span: One of the values that specifies a group of flags for controlling the advisory connection.

param.name: adviseSink
param.span: 介面的指標，該介面位於接收變更告知的通知接收上。

span.span: A pointer to the interface on the advisory sink that will receive the change notification.

param.name: connection
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含識別這個連接的 DWORD 語彙基元 (Token) 的指標。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a DWORD token that identifies this connection.

param.span: 您可以在稍後將這個語彙基元傳遞到 ，以便用它來刪除諮詢連接。

span.span: You can use this token later to delete the advisory connection by passing it to .

param.span: 如果這個值是零，就不會建立連接。

span.span: If this value is zero, the connection was not established.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 建立資料物件和通知接收之間的連接。

span.span: Creates a connection between a data object and an advisory sink.

summary.span: 這個方法是由支援通知接收的物件所呼叫，而且可以讓接收通知收到物件資料變更的通知。

span.span: This method is called by an object that supports an advisory sink and enables the advisory sink to be notified of changes in the object's data.

returns.span: 這個方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列值：

span.span: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following:
Value
Description
S_OK
The advisory connection was created.
E_NOTIMPL

description.span: 沒有在資料物件上實作這個方法。

span.span: This method is not implemented on the data object.
DV_E_LINDEX

description.span: 有一個無效的值；目前只支援 -1。

span.span: There is an invalid value for ; currently, only -1 is supported.
DV_E_FORMATETC
There is an invalid value for the parameter.
OLE_E_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED

description.span: 資料物件不支援變更告知。

span.span: The data object does not support change notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`IDataObject::DAdvise`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDataObject::DAdvise`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetData (ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC format, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM medium);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetData([in]valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC& format, [out] valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM& medium) cil managed
Public Sub GetData (ByRef format As FORMATETC, ByRef medium As STGMEDIUM)
public: void GetData(System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::FORMATETC % format, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::STGMEDIUM % medium);
abstract member GetData : * -> unit

param.name: format
param.span: 以傳址方式傳遞的 結構的指標，定義傳遞資料時所要使用的格式、媒體和目標裝置。

span.span: A pointer to a structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, medium, and target device to use when passing the data.

param.span: 您可以使用布林值 OR 運算子指定多個媒體，好讓方法可以在指定的媒體中選擇最適合的媒體。

span.span: It is possible to specify more than one medium by using the Boolean OR operator, allowing the method to choose the best medium among those specified.

param.name: medium
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含 方法的指標，指出包含透過其 成員傳回資料的存放媒體，以及透過其 成員值釋放媒體的責任。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the structure that indicates the storage medium containing the returned data through its member, and the responsibility for releasing the medium through the value of its member.

param.span: 如果 為 ，便由媒體的接收者負責釋放媒體；否則 會指向適當物件上的 介面，以便呼叫其 方法。

span.span: If is , the receiver of the medium is responsible for releasing it; otherwise, points to the interface on the appropriate object so its method can be called.

param.span: 媒體必須由 配置及填入。

span.span: The medium must be allocated and filled in by .

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 從來源資料物件取得資料。

span.span: Obtains data from a source data object.

summary.span: 方法由資料消費者 (Data Consumer) 呼叫，以呈現指定的 結構所描述的資料，並透過指定的 結構傳輸這些資料。

span.span: The method, which is called by a data consumer, renders the data described in the specified structure and transfers it through the specified structure.

summary.span: 接著再由呼叫端負責釋放 結構。

span.span: The caller then assumes responsibility for releasing the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`IDataObject::GetData`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDataObject::GetData`, see the MSDN Library.

abstract member SetData : * * bool -> unit

param.name: formatIn
param.span: 以傳址方式傳遞的 結構，定義資料物件在解譯存放媒體內含資料時所使用的格式。

span.span: A structure, passed by reference, that defines the format used by the data object when interpreting the data contained in the storage medium.

param.name: medium
param.span: 以傳址方傳遞的 結構，定義用來傳遞資料的存放媒體。

span.span: A structure, passed by reference, that defines the storage medium in which the data is being passed.

param.name: release
param.span: 指定在呼叫傳回之後，呼叫的資料物件 (實作 ) 便會擁有存放媒體。

span.span: to specify that the data object called, which implements , owns the storage medium after the call returns.

param.span: 這表示資料物件必須在使用媒體之後，呼叫 函式來釋放媒體。

span.span: This means that the data object must free the medium after it has been used by calling the function.

param.span: 則指定呼叫端仍保留存放媒體的擁有權，而呼叫的物件資料只在呼叫期間使用存放媒體。

span.span: to specify that the caller retains ownership of the storage medium, and the data object called uses the storage medium for the duration of the call only.

summary.span: 將資料傳輸給實作這個方法的物件。

span.span: Transfers data to the object that implements this method.

summary.span: 這個方法是由包含資料來源的物件所呼叫。

span.span: This method is called by an object that contains a data source.
